attributes.action: Let the Chagos Islanders return to their homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 40 years ago the Chagos Islanders were taken from their Island and dumped in Mauritius. They were only allowed to take what they were carrying. The reason for this was that England had agreed to let the US take over the Island and use it for B52 bombing runs. The US demanded that the Islanders be taken off the Island. Many of them were left to slive in slums. Makes you proud to be British?
